page.title: Rates | Book Your Session ‚Äî Professional Headshot Photographer | Loudoun County, VA
page.description: Explore individual pricing and services for professional headshots in Loudoun County, VA. Book now for expert coaching and image retouching.

hero.title: Choose Your Perfect Package
hero.subtitle: Your headshot is your digital first impression. In a relaxed, guided session, we'll create images that elevate your brand and feel authentically you.

packages.name: The Express
packages.description: Perfect for busy professionals who need polished headshots quickly.
packages.whatsIncluded: A focused, in-studio headshot session for professionals who need a clean, confident update. Includes up to 20 minutes, one lighting setup, guided posing, and two fully retouched images. Additional images are available at $195 each. Professional makeup may be added for $150.

packages.name: The Signature
packages.description: Our comprehensive session for professionals who want variety and options.
packages.whatsIncluded: A one-hour studio experience designed to capture range, confidence, and versatility. Includes a pre-session consultation, complete wardrobe and posing guidance, and two to three background and lighting setups. Five fully retouched, high-resolution images are delivered via an online gallery within 7‚Äì10 business days, optimized for all professional platforms. Additional images available at $195 each. Professional makeup may be added for $150.

packages.name: The Executive
packages.description: The ultimate headshot experience for established professionals who need a complete image library.
packages.whatsIncluded: A fully curated, high-visibility portrait experience for women stepping into leadership, influence, or legacy moments. Includes a 30-minute pre-session strategy consultation, complete style and wardrobe guidance, and professional makeup as part of the experience. The 90-minute studio session allows for multiple looks, backgrounds, and lighting styles, with same-day image preview available. Ten fully retouched, high-resolution images are delivered within 7‚Äì10 business days, optimized for professional and editorial use.

steps.title: Book Online
steps.description: Choose your perfect session and schedule your appointment online

steps.title: Prep Guide Arrives
steps.description: Receive detailed preparation tips to look your absolute best

steps.title: Guided Session
steps.description: Relax and enjoy a professional, comfortable photo experience

steps.title: Select Images
steps.description: Review and choose your favorite shots from the session

steps.title: Final Delivery
steps.description: Receive your professionally retouched images in 7-10 business days

reviews.name: E. Zeigler
reviews.text: I had an absolutely amazing experience working with Marquel. She made the entire process feel effortless.

reviews.name: J. Dennis
reviews.text: Marquel is very friendly and professional. She made me feel at ease and took fantastic headshots!

reviews.name: C. Everett
reviews.text: Marquel is the absolute truth! Her professionalism and suggestions on clothing, stance, poses brought out the image that I wanted to portray. I ADORE my new headshots!

giftCards.title: Photography Gift Cards
giftCards.intro: Give someone you care about the opportunity to shine.
giftCards.description: Know someone who's been putting off getting professional headshots? A photography gift card is the perfect way to encourage them to invest in their professional image. Ideal for birthdays, graduations, promotions, or just because‚Äîour gift cards work for any session package listed above.
giftCards.benefits: Flexible and convenient: Gift cards never expire, can be combined with other offers, and are delivered instantly via email. The perfect last-minute gift that shows you care about their success.
